dialogue.introduction: Admiral, Light Cruiser Ooyodo has joined the battle lines. Please leave the fleet administration & supervision to me.
dialogue.library_intro: Designed as a cutting edge C&C flagship, the newest light cruiser, Ooyodo. There was a problem with the installation of the specified new model recon, & the battle situation changed, so I wasn't really able to undertake my role as the combined fleet flagship. However, I participated in the Northern Operation & the Battle of Mindoro. I, too, will do my best on the front lines.
dialogue.secretary1: Yes. Please leave it to me. Admiral, it's really starting to feel like Autumn now, right? (Seasonal Line) Admiral, Winter is a bit quiet, right? (Seasonal Line)
dialogue.secretary2: Admiral, is that perhaps a communication method? Straight talk would be better, I think. Yes.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, that's not communications equipment. Careless touching - it reflects poorly on the fleet's command.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, it is time for the next mission... Oh, Admiral? Admiral? Did you hear me? Hey?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, for always treasuring Ooyodo, I really thank you. Iâ€™ve been watching all this time you know? Have you noticed?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, did you call for Ooyodo? Eh, is this for me? Thank you so much, Admiral. I'll treasure this forever.
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, I've organized our fleet's intelligence.
dialogue.equipment1: A remodel for me? Thank you so much.
dialogue.equipment2: I see. It seems that I want to be loaded with torpedoes... However...
dialogue.supply: Supply & logistics, they are important, no?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I am really sorry. I'll fall back a little.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I have no excuse. I would be happy if you would give me a little free time.
dialogue.docking_complete: The repairs on the ship in the dock have completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Fleet, the mission was a success. Good work everyone!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Combined fleet's flagship, Ooyodo, casting off!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted. Ready the cannons, please!
dialogue.night_battle: Remember the Battle of Mindoro. All ships, sally forth!
dialogue.night_attack: Fleet movement is... Yes, good job everyone.
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Fleet movement is... Yes, good job everyone.
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Fleet movement is... Yes, good job everyone.
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Fleet movement is... Yes, good job everyone.
dialogue.mvp: Eh, my accomplishments were the greatest? My, how unexpected. But I'm somewhat proud, ufufu.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: No way... A starboard list? Flood the ballast!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Geh, they got me! B-but, I won't sink yet. Ooyodo, will not sink!
dialogue.sunk: Damage control, hurry! Eh, it's no good? It's no good! Admiral, it looks like this is the end of the line. We'll meet sometime, somewhere, I'm sure...
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: Admiral, the Reigou-sakusen is coming, I will do my best!
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral, Happy New Year. I'll be counting on you again this year.
dialogue.fall_2015: Admiral, I can feel that autumn is just around the corner.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, it's Christmas isn't it? Merry Christmas!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Admiral, the Reigou-sakusen is coming, I will do my best!

hourly.0000: Admiral, the day has changed. Let's have a great day today, too.
hourly.0100: Admiral, it is now 0100. Leave the time reporting to me, Ooyodo.
hourly.0200: Admiral, it's 0200. Oh? Admiral, are you perhaps tired?
hourly.0300: 0300. While the Admiral takes a break, I shall re-examine the fleet administration's plans.
hourly.0400: It is now 0400. The Admiral's sleeping face is so cute! Ufufu, I profited a bit!
hourly.0500: It's 0500. Admiral, it's morning. Time to wake all the members! Wake them all!
hourly.0600: 0600. Admiral, I have completed the breakfast prep. I tried putting rice-bread in the miso!
hourly.0700: It is now 0700. Admiral, have you finished your breakfast? I shall clean up, okay?
hourly.0800: 0800. Okay! Fleet practice! Let's make it a strict one!
hourly.0900: Admiral, it's 0900. After drills is sorting, yes? The sortie plan is over here.
hourly.1000: It's 1000. Tone-san is here today too, no? Tone-saaaan!
hourly.1100: 1100. Tone-san & Chikuma-san are such good friends... I'm a little jealous...
hourly.1200: 1200. Admiral, Let's have curry for lunch - Military Band curry.
hourly.1300: It's 1300. Admiral, how about some of Ooyodo's curry? Isn't it a different flavor?
hourly.1400: It is now 1400. Oh my? Ashigara-san. What's the matter? I see.
hourly.1500: It's 1500. She's a heavy cruiser, but Ashigara-san is mysteriously on the same wavelength as I am. Ufufufu.
hourly.1600: It's 1600. Admiral, Ashigara-san. A request for a large amount of sirlon pork & cooking oil.
hourly.1700: It is now 1700. Admiral, the dusk sea is beautiful, is it not?
hourly.1800: Admiral, it's 1800. What would be good for dinner? Sashimi or suchlike?
hourly.1900: 1900. Admiral, there's an issue with dinner... Let's go for cutlets. How about it?
hourly.2000: It's 2000. Admiral, here is the after-dinner tea.
hourly.2100: It is now 2100. It's almost time...for night battles, no? Ufufu. I won't do night battles, though. Here, the documents.
hourly.2200: It's 2200. Admiral, it's almost the end of overtime. Won't you take it easy?
hourly.2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Thank you once again for a hard day's work. Let's do our best tomorrow, too.
